Item.name: Immolator Implant
Item.description: An implant distributed anyone who doesn't want their equipment in the wrong hands.

Item.name: Ventdweller's Diving Mask
Item.description: A hardened diving mask which has been thoroughly modified by the ventdwellers. The unassuming oxygenite tank has been filtered and mixed to a precise point to allow the wearer to survive crushing depths. The mask itself has also been greatly reinforced, and the lenses block almost all light.

Item.name: Maid Outfit
Item.description: Maid dresses were imported alongside clown costumes to try to 'entertain' crewmates. Although it was an abject failure and never caught on like the Honkmother did, some suits have survived all these years. Counts as a clown outfit because of its history.

Item.name: Cat Ears
Item.description: A decorative headband to complement the maid dress. Counts as a clown mask.

Item.name: Auto-Detonator Headset
Item.description: A crude deadman's switch built into the frame of a headset. Triggers when the wearer is in critical condition. High-temperature or high-power explosives will destroy the body and render any possessions irrecoverable.

Item.name: Peacekeeper Gas Mask
Item.description: Though not as protective as the Commando's gas mask, this one features a complex filter that completely negates airborne irritants and even some pathogens.

Item.name: Commando Gas Mask
Item.description: A heavy combat helmet fitted with a durable filter that resists airborne irritants.

Item.name: Enforcer Gas Mask
Item.description: A more expensive variant of the heavy mask which also prevents all infection. It is used by CENTCOM officials and enforcers to deal with viral outbreaks.

Item.name: Pacifier's Vest
Item.description: An extraordinarily protective armor vest designed for the Coalition's anti-chaos units.

Item.name: Pacifier's Helmet
Item.description: An extremely resilient helmet fielded by the Coalition's most elite anti-chaos units.

Item.name: Pacifier's Uniform
Item.description: A heavily armored uniform saved for the Coalition's elite chaos control squads.

Item.name: Juggernaut Armor
Item.description: A cheap and extremely protective but exceptionally heavy suit of armor which does not protect against pressure due to having all the life support systems replaced with armor. The armor's bulk makes it difficult to handle weapons properly, but it prevents you from being knocked over by recoil.

Item.name: Juggernaut Helmet
Item.description: An exceptionally protective helmet to match the Juggernaut Armor. It contains an oxygen tank container to keep the armor viable in some low-oxygen situations.

Item.name: Heavy Riot Shield
Item.description: A heavier, larger shield designed to take more damage and keep its user even safer.

Item.name: Trench Coat
Item.decription: The ideal attire for any shady smugglers and aspiring shooters.

Item.name: Trench Hat
Item.description: This inconspicuous and stylish hat conceals a small helmet, protecting the wearer's head against damage, concussions, and electrified batons.

Item.name: Winter Coat (Coalition)
Item.decription: A specialized coat designed to keep its wearer warm in cold environments.

Item.name: Winter Hat (Coalition)
Item.description: A warm hat, comes with a bandana to cover the wearer's mouth and nose.

Item.name: Winter Coat (Jovian)
Item.decription: A cheaper coat with larger pockets and less protection.

Item.name: Winter Hat (Jovian)
Item.description: A warm hat, comes with a bandana to cover the wearer's lower face.

Item.name: Winter Coat (Clown)
Item.decription: A Jovian coat hastily repainted into a clown uniform.

Item.name: Santa's Coat
Item.description: A fine, festive coat.

Item.name: Santa's Elf Coat
Item.description: A fine, festive coat.

Item.name: Santa Hat and Beard
Item.description: A festive hat and beard for the jolliest man alive.

Item.name: Santa's Elf Hat
Item.description: A festive follower's hat.

Item.name: Papahka
Item.description: An exceptionally warm and protective hat.

Item.name: Diving Helmet
Item.description: A removed diving helmet which functions as a mask.

Item.name: Broken Diving Helmet
Item.description: A diving helmet with a shattered visor.

Item.name: Combat Diving Helmet
Item.description: A lighter helmet with increased protective value.

Item.name: Abyss Diving Helmet
Item.description: An extremely protective helmet.

Item.name: Sliphelm
Item.description: A hydrodynamic helmet designed to increase the wearer's speed while they are underwater.

Item.name: Clown Armor
Item.description: Body armor repainted to match clown attire.

Item.name: Father's Gaze
Item.description: A blessing made by the hands and blood of the Father's followers. A powerful spell protects its wearer from harm.

Item.name: Father's Deterrence
Item.description: A blessing made by the hands and blood of the Father's followers. A powerful spell protects any clown who wears this attire.

sprite.name: Legendary Clown's Costume Right Lower Arm
Legendary Clown's Costume Left Lower Arm
Legendary Clown's Costume Right Upper Arm
Legendary Clown's Costume Left Upper Arm

Item.name: Trotsky's Vision
Item.description: Clowns and Trotskyism are surprisingly similar when you think about it.

Item.name: Follower's Adoration
Item.description: Clowns and Trotskyism are surprisingly similar when you think about it.

Item.name: Wardrobe Horn
Item.description: Generates a set of Follower's clothing when honked.

Item.name: Fractal Beak
Item.description: A strange alien helmet.

Item.name: Fractal Exoskeleton
Item.decription: A full-body suit of alien armor, somehow meant for human use.

Item.name: Trombone Implant
Item.description: An implant distributed to clowns that plays a sad trombone on death.

Item.name: Fortification Implant
Item.description: An implant distributed to COTH missionaries to fortify against the negative effects of Calyxanide.

Item.name: Missionary's Mask
Item.description: A mask designed to identify fellow believers.

Item.name: Missionary's Uniform
Item.description: A fairly typical uniform used to identify friendly missionaries of the Church of the Husk.

Item.name: Ascendancy's Enlightenment
Item.description: I've seen in a dream that I'm destined for a throne,

Item.name: Ascendancy's Embodiment
Item.decription: Once I've conquered the cage of this flesh and bone.

Item.name: Prison Pocket
Item.description: Place this in your gene splicer slot to smuggle items.

Item.name: Small Hidden Pocket
Item.description: A secret compartment.

Item.name: Hidden Pocket
Item.description: A secret compartment rarely used by high-ranking infiltrators. Alien technology gives it an anomalously large storage capacity and a rarity to match.

Item.name: Large Hidden Pocket
Item.description: A secret compartment rarely used by high-ranking infiltrators. Alien technology gives it an anomalously large storage capacity and a rarity to match.

Item.name: Imperfect Mask
Item.description: It hungers for all.. Even its wearer.

Item.name: Bleeding Mask
Item.description: An odd mask which seems to be constantly leaking human blood.

Item.name: Eternal Bleeding Mask
Item.description: An odd mask which seems to be constantly leaking human blood. It has been grafted onto the wearer's face.. Or perhaps it grafted itself on.

Item.name: Eternal Father's Deterrence
Item.description: A blessing warped into a curse, an omen of death and pain. It will haunt its wearer just as they haunt their victims; eternally, until death.

sprite.name: Legendary Clown's Costume Right Lower Arm
Legendary Clown's Costume Left Lower Arm
Legendary Clown's Costume Right Upper Arm
Legendary Clown's Costume Left Upper Arm

Item.name: Abyssal Cultist Hood
Item.description: Some say we're doomed in the heart of our beliefs,

Item.name: Abyssal Cultist Robe
Item.description: Death stilled their lips and maintained the peace we keep.

Item.name: Grey Wizard Robe
Item.description: Brings a whole new meaning to greytider. Terrifyingly flame retardant.

Item.name: Grey Wizard Hat
Item.description: You shall not pass!

Item.name: Abyssal Cultist Garments
Item.description: A one-piece robe with a hood included. Allows the simultaneous use of a proper helmet.

Item.name: Abyssal Harbinger Garments
Item.description: A one-piece robe enchanted by and for Abyssal Harbingers.

Item.name: Elder Cultist Garments
Item.description: The old one beckons.

sprite.name: Elder Cultist robe Left Lower Arm
Elder Cultist robe Right Lower Arm
Elder Cultist robe Left Upper Arm
Elder Cultist robe Right Upper Arm

Item.name: Curse Implant
Item.description: An implant distributed to Harbingers to punish those who kill them.

Item.name: Abyssal Ritual Lantern
Item.description: A lantern which soothes all nearby demons.

Item.name: Mining Lantern
Item.description: A simple LED lantern, useful for lighting dark areas.

Item.name: Elder Lantern
Item.description: Don't run.

Item.name: Modified Toolbelt
Item.description: A modified toolbelt which can hold medium items, but limits stacking. Features fireproofing.

Item.name: Cursed Bike Horn
Item.description: What horrible thing must you have done to be cursed with this horn? There is no escape from this torment, you will never be free.

Item.name: Cursed Clown Mask
Item.description: You are stuck with this mask forever, it will never be removed and your face will always be that of the punished.

Item.name: Cursed Clown Costume
Item.description: From the annoying honks this outfit makes to the cursed nature, it exists to torture the wearer.

Item.name: Cursed Clown Mask 2
Item.description: You are stuck with this mask forever, it will never be removed and your face will always be that of the punished.

Item.name: Assault Suit
Item.description: A Coalition-built suit based off the PUCS but significantly simplified so it can be produced more easily. It is intended for amphibious assault teams who may need to deal with breaches at any moment. Rated for 6000 meters.

Item.name: Hunter's Cloak
Item.description: Just go out and kill a few Husks, it's for your own good.

Item.name: Hunter's Hat
Item.description: A Hunter is a Hunter, even under the ice.

Item.name: Stripper's Clown Costume
Item.description: An EXTRA funny clown costume with extra skin and some GIANT INFLATABLE HONKERS.

Item.name: Lobotomization Implant
Item.description: An implant forcibly placed within a subject to pacify them.

Item.name: Purifier's Exoskeleton
Item.description: A heavy exoskeleton customized for the specifications of a Purifier.

Item.name: Purifier's Armor
Item.description: Heretics shall be purged.

Item.name: Purifier's Helmet
Item.description: For the One who Grips.

Item.name: Kromer's Coat
Item.decription: The ideal attire for dreamers of human wholeness.

Item.name: Kromer's Helmet
Item.description: Placeholder for resistances.
